headers.subject: [Good] Flattr fights hard to make their ToS consumer-rights friendly

subject: [Good] Flattr fights hard to make their ToS consumer-rights friendly
text:
While talking to the Flattr people last night, it was mentioned that
they simplified and minimized their Terms-of-Service as much as they
could, and also store as little data as they can about users, and
don't spy on users.
